OOC: All right.  I promise this will be my last absence for the summer...  
Maybe...  I hope...  I'll only be gone until Wednesday.  If Airly doesn't 
mind, I'm going to leave my characters with her.  Until then.  Bye.

--part1_12f.33ed774.28b1441a_boundary
